content.rendered:
The triskelion is the symbol of intransigence and liberty.

If you’re like interested in the spiritual meanings behind numbers, symbols and images, you’ll love this interesting art of piece created for one of our client’s today

Let’s have a glimpse about it below and know more about it

Symbols can have multiple meanings and a vast history that spans across thousands of years, and hundreds of different countries and cultures.The meanings of symbols can change over time, as images and icons are used by different societies, cultures, religions and political groups.

They can be so small and simple yet hold an unbelievably strong force for the wearer. That is why the triskele or the triskelion is a design that has three spirals that are interlocked.

Triskelion tattoo

The triskele has many variations when it comes to the design aspect of the tattoos which adds to its attraction to people who are into the world of tattoos due to the spiritual significance. The three loops are all joined together and so the symbol can mean everlasting love, protection, and the unity of combined forces.

Meaning of the Three Symbolic Extensions of the Triskelion

  • Spirit, Mind, Body
  • Father, Son, Holy Ghost
  • Mother, Father, Child
  • Past, Present, Future
  • Power, Intellect, Love
  • Creator, Destroyer, Sustainer
  • Creation, Preservation, Destruction

As you may be aware that most things connected to mysticism have two sides – a negative and a positive side. When you are getting a triskele tattoo, do make sure you know it signifies and proceed only if it is of significance to you.

The triskele has many variations when it comes to the design aspect of the tattoos which adds to its attraction to people who are into the world of tattoos due to the spiritual significance. We are sure that when you delve deeper into the triskele mystic, you will find as many negative aspects of it too. All these do not matter as long as you are clear about your motivation in getting the tattoo.

I hope you have enjoyed this more detailed background of the fascinating triskelion. Symbol meanings.Happy symbolic journeys, and thanks for reading.
